snippet: Wayne Rooney still has an important role to play in manager Gareth Southgate's England squad, former national manager Roy Hodgson has said after the striker's leadership was recently called into question....
lead_paragraph: Wayne Rooney still has an important role to play in manager Gareth Southgate's England squad, former national manager Roy Hodgson has said after the striker's leadership was recently called into question.

headline.main: Hodgson Feels Rooney Still Has Role to Play for England
headline.print_headline: Hodgson Feels Rooney Still Has Role to Play for England
